source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Melt & Pour Soap Making Home Business Marketing Starter Kit
items.headline: How to do marketing for a melt & pour soap making home business
objectives_summary: This Is A Basic Melt & Pour Soap Home Business For Beginners Marketing Course
In this course we will focus on how to do marketing for your melt and pour soap home business.
The design and creation of melt and pour soap from soap base while very important will be second to the actual home business marketing information

items.title: Impressionism - Paint this Farmhouse with Oils or Acrylics
items.headline: Learn Impressionism techniques by creating this Farm Countryside painting. For total beginner through advanced painters.
objectives_summary: Create an entire painting in one sitting
Understand Impressionism and why it is so powerful
Understand how light works to make things look the way they do, and how to translate that into your paintings

items.title: Brother ScanNCut - Working with Fonts
items.headline: Vinyl, Paper Crafting and Canvas Workspace Font Projects
objectives_summary: You will be able to use the built-in fonts to create projects with your Brother ScanNCut.
You will be able to install fonts onto your computer to use with Canvas Workspace.
You will be able to design and cut font projects using your Brother ScanNCut.

items.title: Learn how to paint Byzantine Icons (Part 1)
items.headline: Byzantine icons from scratch
objectives_summary: Learn how to paint icons from the beginning.
Learn how to paint in the byzantine style.
Paint spiritual images.

items.title: Beginning Oil Painting: A Simple Approach for Rapid Success
items.headline: Quickly gain basic oil painting skills with this simple approach - start creating your own original art with confidence
objectives_summary: To gather and compose original reference for their paintings.
To accurately and repeatably mix color.
To compose their painting in an interesting and pleasing manner.

items.title: Cold Process Soap making #3 - Soap Swirling Made Easy

visible_instructors.title: Shona O'Connor
visible_instructors.job_title: Crafter, Maker of Soap, Hair, Bath and Body, Trainer
visible_instructors.name: Shona

items.headline: How to make soap using swirling techniques to create dramatic and stunning looking soaps -  tips and tricks for success
objectives_summary: Easily  create soaps with stunning swirl effects
Discover the factors that affect trace, cause your soap to accelerate and can prevent you from creating successful swirls
Tailor your recipes to give you more time to produce the swirled effects that you want.

items.title: Expressive Drawing, Painting & Mixed Media Techniques Course

visible_instructors.title: Chad Neuman, Ph.D.
visible_instructors.job_title: Professor / Graphic Designer / Photographer 20+ yrs exp.
visible_instructors.name: Chad

visible_instructors.title: Jonathan Simon, BFA, MFA
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist, Illustrator, Professor 28+ yrs exp.
visible_instructors.name: Jonathan

items.headline: Learn methods+materials for amazing art: watercolor, acrylic, ink, pens, charcoal, pencil, pastel, abstract and more.
objectives_summary: Learn how to use charcoal, graphite pencil, pens, and makers to effectively draw, individually and in combination with other materials
Learn how to use watercolor paint, India ink, and acrylic paint to produce artistic, colorful washes
Learn how to effectively paint with India ink and acrylic paint, using various dynamic mark making techniques

items.title: Character Design for Beginners - Create Your First Character
items.headline: Learn the Basics of Character Design - From Drawing and Design to Digital Illustration Using Procreate on iPad
objectives_summary: Basics of digital illustration
Come up with your own characters
Able to set mood with light and shadow

items.title: Modern Calligraphy: Pointed Pen Basics
items.headline: Everything you need to get started in modern calligraphy
objectives_summary: Basics of modern calligraphy - lowercase and uppercase alphabets, connecting letters, words, numbers, and basic punctuation marks
Best supplies for beginners

items.title: Learn to Make Polymer Clay Jewelry
items.headline: Start making your own creative polymer clay jewelry.
objectives_summary: Create and design own polymer clay jewelry.
Learn basic principles of working with polymer clay and jewelry making basics
Have some great products to share with your friends and family

items.title: How to Digitally Paint -- Paint with Manga Studio 5
items.headline: Go from sketch artist to master digital painter with How to Paint with Manga Studio 5.
objectives_summary: Blend colors in Manga Studio like a professional painter
Paint stunning digital paintings
Compose paintings like Leonardo Da'Vinci

items.title: Card Making with the Brother ScanNCut
items.headline: Canvas Workspace Projects & Paper Crafting Techniques
objectives_summary: Students will learn a variety of card making techniques.
Students will learn how to work inside of Canvas Workspace.
Students will learn how to use the Brother ScanNCut to assist with card making projects.

items.title: Understanding Color & How to Mix It
items.headline: Teaching Your Colors to Play Well With Others
objectives_summary: A Thorough Understanding of Color
How to Choose Your Colors
Which Way a Color Leans and How that Affects Color Mixes

items.title: Painting SPECIAL EFFECTS & pro tips for more watercolor fun.

visible_instructors.title: Nicola A Blakemore
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist, Teacher and Creative Entrepreneur
visible_instructors.name: Nicola A

items.headline: Learn watercolour effects & techniques to make your work stand out. What to use how to do it and where to use it. Easy.
objectives_summary: Get more fun and enjoyment out of your watercolour painting
Make your watercolour paintings stand out from the crowd.
Give drama to your watercolour paintings.

items.title: Digital Marbling: Create Stunning Abstract Art in Procreate
items.headline: Learn to create in a fun new way!
objectives_summary: Learn how to create a beautiful abstract piece of art that may resemble Paper Marbling, Ebru, Suminagshi, Acrylic fluid pouring, Dirty Pouring, Bottle Cap Pouring, etc
The basics of Procreate
How to use Procreate's liquify tools to create beautiful art

items.title: Watercolor Painting for Beginners
items.headline: Basic Watercolor Techniques
objectives_summary: Start painting with watercolor with this fun and easy guide to the basic techniques. Step by step guided course for beginners.

In this class, we’ll start with a basic introduction of watercolor tools. I’ll walk you through the color theory. You will learn how to create, blend and shape colors with brush strokes. Then you’ll put it all into action by creating your own dreamy watercolor painting.
You will learn about your materials and how to see the full potential of your brushes and other materials to create textures in watercolor
